description: This file contains test functions for verifying the metrics collection and aggregation in a team-based AI system, including individual and session metrics, streaming responses, and multi-run scenarios.

methods.name: test_team_metrics_basic
methods.description: Tests basic team metrics functionality including response and member metrics.

methods.name: test_team_metrics_streaming
methods.description: Tests team metrics collection during streaming responses.

methods.name: test_team_metrics_multiple_runs
methods.description: Verifies metrics accumulation across multiple runs.

methods.name: test_member_metrics_aggregation
methods.description: Checks correct aggregation of member metrics over multiple runs.
